dimensions: Warp: 101 cm (39 3/4 in.). Weft: 135 cm (53 1/4 in.) Weft is two incomplete pieces sewn together. Pattern: height of repeat: 52 cm (20 1/2 in.). Designed for lengths to be sewn together as a straight repeat.
title: Monumens de Paris
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: Four familiar scenes of Paris; statue of Henri IV on Pont Neuf, the Fountain of the Inocents, the Parthenon and the east front of the Louvre all shown in elaborate frames. In pale brown on white background.
name: Fragment
